thread.title: David in Saxapahaw, NC
thread.title_full: willisorchards.com reviewed by David in Saxapahaw, NC

author: David in Saxapahaw, NC
title: David in Saxapahaw, NC
text: In spite of mixed revews, I ordered several hundred dollars of blueberries, pomegranate trees, kiwi, apricot trees, scuppernog grapes, muscadines, and a quince tree. Order came promptly and as specified. We planted a few weeks ago, and everything seems to be healthy and thriving. Very pleased with size and girth, except for kiwi, it was smaller than expected. I would recommend purchasing from Willis Orchards.
